name: POOM POOM TCHI!
description:
POOM POOM TCHI! is a multiplayer platformer 2D about making your enemy grow to explosion. You need to combine keys on rythm to protect, reload or fire. All actions happen at the same time.

You just need gamepad controllers and some friends. ツ

LINK TO ►THE LUDUM DARE 34


Francois Corbel - Developper
Julien Balestrieri - Developper
Lucien Coycault - 2D Artist
Claire Allante - 3D Artist
